name: Orcs and churches
description:
Orcs and churches 

This game is about defending the church from incoming orc attackers with your knights. To kill a orc you need to collide it with one of your knights. To earn points you need to collide a knight with the church.

By moving towards a recource with a knight it will start collecting that resource over time. When you have enough resources you can buy new buildings in the menu on the left side of the screen.

Controls:
- Use mouse to select or drag select units.
- Move units using the right mouse button.
- You can pan the cam around using the WASD keys.
- Zoom using the scroll wheel.

This game has been made in a week and was my first try at drawing my own art and making my own animations for them.
